item.text: Now when Mordecai became aware of all that had been done, he tore his garments and put on sackcloth and ashes. He went out into the city, crying out in a loud and bitter voice.

But he <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="05704 06440">no farther than</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> one was permitted to <st data-num="0935 0413">enter</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="03830" class="">clothed</st> in <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st>.

Throughout <st data-num="04082" class="">each</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04082" class="">province</st> <st data-num="04725 0834">where</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">edict</st> and <st data-num="01881" class="">law</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">were announced</st><n id="1" /> there was <st data-num="01419" class="">considerable</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="060" class="">mourning</st> among the <st data-num="03064" class="">Jews</st>, along with <st data-num="06685" class="">fasting</st>, <st data-num="01065" class="">weeping</st>, and <st data-num="04553" class="">sorrow</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08242" class="">Sackcloth</st> and <st data-num="0665" class="">ashes</st> were <st data-num="03331" class="">characteristic</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st>.

When <st data-num="0635" class="">Esther’s</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">female attendants</st> and her <st data-num="05631" class="">eunuchs</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">informed</st> her about Mordecai’s behavior,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04436" class="">queen</st> was <st data-num="03966" class="">overcome</st> with <st data-num="02342" class="">anguish</st>. Although she <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> for <st data-num="04782" class="">Mordecai</st> to <st data-num="03847" class="">put on</st> so that he could <st data-num="05493 05921">remove</st> his <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st>, he would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06901" class="">accept</st> them.

So <st data-num="0635" class="">Esther</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> for <st data-num="02047" class="">Hathach</st>, one of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="05631" class="">eunuchs</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> had been <st data-num="05975" class="">placed</st> at her <st data-num="06440" class="">service</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06680" class="">instructed</st> him to <st data-num="03045" class="">find out</st> the <st data-num="04100 02088">cause</st> and <st data-num="05921 04100 02088">reason</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> <st data-num="04782" class="">Mordecai’s</st> behavior.<n id="2" />

So <st data-num="02047" class="">Hathach</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04782" class="">Mordecai</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07339" class="">plaza</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0834 06440">in front of</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>.

Then <st data-num="04782" class="">Mordecai</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">related</st> to him <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had <st data-num="07136" class="">happened</st> to him, even the <st data-num="06575" class="">specific amount</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="02001" class="">Haman</st> had <st data-num="0559" class="">offered</st> to <st data-num="08254" class="">pay</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01595" class="">treasuries</st> for the <st data-num="03064" class="">Jews</st> to be <st data-num="06" class="">destroyed</st>.

He also <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> him a <st data-num="03791" class="">written</st> <st data-num="06572" class="">copy</st> of the <st data-num="01881" class="">law</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had been <st data-num="05414" class="">disseminated</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="07800" class="">Susa</st> for their <st data-num="08045" class="">destruction</st> so that he could <st data-num="07200" class="">show</st> it to <st data-num="0635" class="">Esther</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">talk</st> to her <st data-num="05046" class="">about</st> it. He also <st data-num="06680" class="">gave instructions</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">that</st> she should <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> to <st data-num="02603" class="">implore</st> him and <st data-num="01245 06440">petition</st> him <st data-num="05921" class="">on behalf of</st> her <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
So Hathach returned and related Mordecai’s instructions to Esther.
Then Esther replied to Hathach with instructions for Mordecai:

“All the servants of the king and the people of the king’s provinces know that there is only one law applicable to any man or woman who comes uninvited to the king in the inner court—that person will be put to death, unless the king extends to him the gold scepter, permitting him to be spared. Now I have not been invited to come to the king for some 30 days.”
When Esther’s reply was conveyed to Mordecai,

<st data-num="04782" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="07725" class="">take back</st> this <st data-num="07725" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0635" class="">Esther</st>: “<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="01819 05315">imagine</st> that because you are part of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> you will be the <st data-num="03605" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03064" class="">Jew</st><n id="2" /> who will <st data-num="04422" class="">escape</st>.

If you keep quiet at this time, liberation and protection for the Jews will appear from another source, while you and your father’s household perish. It may very well be that you have achieved royal status for such a time as this!”
Then Esther sent this reply to Mordecai:

“Go, assemble all the Jews who are found in Susa, and fast on my behalf. Don’t eat and don’t drink for three days, night or day. My female attendants and I will also fast in the same way. Afterward I will go to the king, even though it violates the law. If I perish, I perish.”
So Mordecai set out to do everything that Esther had instructed him.
